name: Heaven Spear
description:
Fight the evil Fallen angel with your trusty Spear!

Made for the Mini Jam 70:

Theme: Heaven

Limitation: Player is an inanimate object

Controls:

Move the Spear with your mouse.

Left Click to dash (dash towards the enemy to deal more damage)

Tip: Your Hitbox is the tip of the spear!

The game is pretty bad, but is my first time making a game in 72 hours.

Due to lack of time, I was not able to give context to the game (cinematic , lore , etc)

Credits:

Sound effects and music obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Color Palette "RESURRECT 32": https://lospec.com/palette-list/resurrect-32
